pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semiparametric Bayesian Density Estimation // Offers Bayesian semiparametric density estimation and tail-index estimation for heavy tailed data, by using a parametric, tail-respecting transformation of the data to the unit interval and then modeling the transformed data with a purely nonparametric logistic Gaussian process density prior. Based on Tokdar et al. (2022) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2104727.
